verses.text: And he \w made|strong="H6213"\w* the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* of burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w* \add of\add* \w shittim|strong="H7848"\w* \w wood|strong="H6086"\w*: \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w* \add was\add* the \w length|strong="H0753"\w* thereof, and \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w* the \w breadth|strong="H7341"\w* thereof; \add it was\add* \w foursquare|strong="H7251"\w*; and \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w* the \w height|strong="H6967"\w* thereof.

And he \w made|strong="H6213"\w* the \w horns|strong="H7161"\w* thereof on the \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w corners|strong="H6438"\w* of it; the \w horns|strong="H7161"\w* thereof were of the same: and he \w overlaid|strong="H6823"\w* it with \w brass|strong="H5178"\w*.

And he \w made|strong="H6213"\w* all the \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w* of the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*, the \w pots|strong="H5518"\w*, and the \w shovels|strong="H3257"\w*, and the \w basons|strong="H4219"\w*, \add and\add* the \w fleshhooks|strong="H4207"\w*, and the \w firepans|strong="H4289"\w*: all the \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w* thereof \w made|strong="H6213"\w* he \add of\add* \w brass|strong="H5178"\w*.

And he \w made|strong="H6213"\w* for the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* a \w brasen|strong="H5178"\w* \w grate|strong="H4345"\w* of \w network|strong="H7568"\w* under the \w compass|strong="H3749"\w* thereof \w beneath|strong="H4295"\w* unto the \w midst|strong="H2677"\w* of it.

And he \w cast|strong="H3332"\w* \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w rings|strong="H2885"\w* for the \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w ends|strong="H7099"\w* of the \w grate|strong="H4345"\w* of \w brass|strong="H5178"\w*, \add to be\add* \w places|strong="H1004"\w* for the \w staves|strong="H0905"\w*.

And he \w made|strong="H6213"\w* the \w staves|strong="H0905"\w* \add of\add* \w shittim|strong="H7848"\w* \w wood|strong="H6086"\w*, and \w overlaid|strong="H6823"\w* them with \w brass|strong="H5178"\w*.

And he \w put|strong="H0935"\w* the \w staves|strong="H0905"\w* into the \w rings|strong="H2885"\w* on the \w sides|strong="H6763"\w* of the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*, to \w bear|strong="H5375"\w* it withal; he \w made|strong="H6213"\w* the altar \w hollow|strong="H5014"\w* with \w boards|strong="H3871"\w*.

¶ And he \w made|strong="H6213"\w* the \w laver|strong="H3595"\w* \add of\add* \w brass|strong="H5178"\w*, and the \w foot|strong="H3653"\w* of it \add of\add* \w brass|strong="H5178"\w*, of the \w lookingglasses|strong="H4759"\w* of \add the women\add* \w assembling|strong="H6633"\w*, which \w assembled|strong="H6633"\w* \add at\add* the \w door|strong="H6607"\w* of the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w*.\f + \fr 38.8 \ft lookingglasses: or, brasen glasses\f*\f + \fr 38.8 \ft assembling: Heb. assembling by troops\f*

¶ And he \w made|strong="H6213"\w* the \w court|strong="H2691"\w*: on the \w south|strong="H5045"\w* \w side|strong="H6285"\w* \w southward|strong="H8486"\w* the \w hangings|strong="H7050"\w* of the \w court|strong="H2691"\w* \add were of\add* fine \w twined|strong="H7806"\w* \w linen|strong="H8336"\w*, an \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w*:

Their \w pillars|strong="H5982"\w* \add were\add* \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w*, and their \w brasen|strong="H5178"\w* \w sockets|strong="H0134"\w* \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w*; the \w hooks|strong="H2053"\w* of the \w pillars|strong="H5982"\w* and their \w fillets|strong="H2838"\w* \add were of\add* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*.

And for the \w north|strong="H6828"\w* \w side|strong="H6285"\w* \add the hangings were\add* an \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w*, their \w pillars|strong="H5982"\w* \add were\add* \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w*, and their \w sockets|strong="H0134"\w* of \w brass|strong="H5178"\w* \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w*; the \w hooks|strong="H2053"\w* of the \w pillars|strong="H5982"\w* and their \w fillets|strong="H2838"\w* \add of\add* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*.

And for the \w west|strong="H3220"\w* \w side|strong="H6285"\w* \add were\add* \w hangings|strong="H7050"\w* of \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w*, their \w pillars|strong="H5982"\w* \w ten|strong="H6235"\w*, and their \w sockets|strong="H0134"\w* \w ten|strong="H6235"\w*; the \w hooks|strong="H2053"\w* of the \w pillars|strong="H5982"\w* and their \w fillets|strong="H2838"\w* \add of\add* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*.
And for the \w east|strong="H6924"\w* \w side|strong="H6285"\w* \w eastward|strong="H4217"\w* \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w*.

The \w hangings|strong="H7050"\w* of the one \w side|strong="H3802"\w* \add of the gate were\add* \w fifteen|strong="H2568"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w*; their \w pillars|strong="H5982"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w*, and their \w sockets|strong="H0134"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w*.

And for the \w other|strong="H8145"\w* \w side|strong="H3802"\w* of the \w court|strong="H2691"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w*, on this hand and that hand, \add were\add* \w hangings|strong="H7050"\w* of \w fifteen|strong="H2568"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w*; their \w pillars|strong="H5982"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w*, and their \w sockets|strong="H0134"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w*.
All the \w hangings|strong="H7050"\w* of the \w court|strong="H2691"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w* \add were\add* of fine \w twined|strong="H7806"\w* \w linen|strong="H8336"\w*.

And the \w sockets|strong="H0134"\w* for the \w pillars|strong="H5982"\w* \add were of\add* \w brass|strong="H5178"\w*; the \w hooks|strong="H2053"\w* of the \w pillars|strong="H5982"\w* and their \w fillets|strong="H2838"\w* \add of\add* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*; and the \w overlaying|strong="H6826"\w* of their \w chapiters|strong="H7218"\w* \add of\add* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*; and all the \w pillars|strong="H5982"\w* of the \w court|strong="H2691"\w* \add were\add* \w filleted|strong="H2836"\w* with \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*.

And the \w hanging|strong="H4539"\w* for the \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* of the \w court|strong="H2691"\w* \add was\add* \w needlework|strong="H7551"\w*, \add of\add* \w blue|strong="H8504"\w*, and \w purple|strong="H0713"\w*, and \w scarlet|strong="H8144"\w*, and fine \w twined|strong="H7806"\w* \w linen|strong="H8336"\w*: and \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w* \add was\add* the \w length|strong="H0753"\w*, and the \w height|strong="H6967"\w* in the \w breadth|strong="H7341"\w* \add was\add* \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w*, \w answerable|strong="H5980"\w* to the \w hangings|strong="H7050"\w* of the \w court|strong="H2691"\w*.

And their \w pillars|strong="H5982"\w* \add were\add* \w four|strong="H0702"\w*, and their \w sockets|strong="H0134"\w* \add of\add* \w brass|strong="H5178"\w* \w four|strong="H0702"\w*; their \w hooks|strong="H2053"\w* \add of\add* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, and the \w overlaying|strong="H6826"\w* of their \w chapiters|strong="H7218"\w* and their \w fillets|strong="H2838"\w* \add of\add* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*.
And all the \w pins|strong="H3489"\w* of the \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w*, and of the \w court|strong="H2691"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w*, \add were of\add* \w brass|strong="H5178"\w*.

¶ \w This|strong="H0428"\w* is the \w sum|strong="H6485"\w* of the \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w*, \add even\add* of the \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w* of \w testimony|strong="H5715"\w*, as it was \w counted|strong="H6485"\w*, according to the \w commandment|strong="H6310"\w* of \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \add for\add* the \w service|strong="H5656"\w* of the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*, by the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of \w Ithamar|strong="H0385"\w*, \w son|strong="H1121"\w* to \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*.

And \w Bezaleel|strong="H1212"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Uri|strong="H0221"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Hur|strong="H2354"\w*, of the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, \w made|strong="H6213"\w* all that the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*.

And with him \add was\add* \w Aholiab|strong="H0171"\w*, \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ahisamach|strong="H0294"\w*, of the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of \w Dan|strong="H1835"\w*, an \w engraver|strong="H2796"\w*, and a cunning \w workman|strong="H2803"\w*, and an \w embroiderer|strong="H7551"\w* in \w blue|strong="H8504"\w*, and in \w purple|strong="H0713"\w*, and in \w scarlet|strong="H8144"\w*, and fine \w linen|strong="H8336"\w*.

All the \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* that was \w occupied|strong="H6213"\w* for the \w work|strong="H4399"\w* in all the \w work|strong="H4399"\w* of the \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \add place\add*, even the \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* of the \w offering|strong="H8573"\w*, was \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* and \w nine|strong="H8672"\w* \w talents|strong="H3603"\w*, and \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* and \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* \w shekels|strong="H8255"\w*, after the \w shekel|strong="H8255"\w* of the \w sanctuary|strong="H6944"\w*.

And the \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* of them that were \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* \add was\add* an \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w talents|strong="H3603"\w*, and a \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* and threescore and \w fifteen|strong="H7657"\w* \w shekels|strong="H8255"\w*, after the \w shekel|strong="H8255"\w* of the \w sanctuary|strong="H6944"\w*:

A \w bekah|strong="H1235"\w* for every \w man|strong="H1538"\w*, \add that is\add*, \w half|strong="H4276"\w* a \w shekel|strong="H8255"\w*, after the \w shekel|strong="H8255"\w* of the \w sanctuary|strong="H6944"\w*, for every one that \w went|strong="H5674"\w* to be \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w*, from \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w* and \w upward|strong="H4605"\w*, for \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* and \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* and \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* and \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* \add men\add*.\f + \fr 38.26 \ft every man: Heb. a poll\f*

And of the \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w talents|strong="H3603"\w* of \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* were \w cast|strong="H3332"\w* the \w sockets|strong="H0134"\w* of the \w sanctuary|strong="H6944"\w*, and the \w sockets|strong="H0134"\w* of the \w vail|strong="H6532"\w*; an \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w sockets|strong="H0134"\w* of the \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w talents|strong="H3603"\w*, a \w talent|strong="H3603"\w* for a \w socket|strong="H0134"\w*.

And of the \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w seventy|strong="H7657"\w* and \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \add shekels\add* he \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w hooks|strong="H2053"\w* for the \w pillars|strong="H5982"\w*, and \w overlaid|strong="H6823"\w* their \w chapiters|strong="H7218"\w*, and \w filleted|strong="H2836"\w* them.

And the \w brass|strong="H5178"\w* of the \w offering|strong="H8573"\w* \add was\add* \w seventy|strong="H7657"\w* \w talents|strong="H3603"\w*, and two \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* and \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w shekels|strong="H8255"\w*.

And therewith he \w made|strong="H6213"\w* the \w sockets|strong="H0134"\w* to the \w door|strong="H6607"\w* of the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w*, and the \w brasen|strong="H5178"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*, and the \w brasen|strong="H5178"\w* \w grate|strong="H4345"\w* for it, and all the \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w* of the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*,

And the \w sockets|strong="H0134"\w* of the \w court|strong="H2691"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w*, and the \w sockets|strong="H0134"\w* of the \w court|strong="H2691"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w*, and all the \w pins|strong="H3489"\w* of the \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w*, and all the \w pins|strong="H3489"\w* of the \w court|strong="H2691"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w*.
